message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $12000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  How about $10000? This is still a good price for you, and it fits within my budget.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $11500, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of it.
